hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
OMERO_DIST=$HOME/OMERO.server if [ -e $OMERO_DIST ]; then
if [ -e $WORKSPACE/omeropy-virtualenv ]; then source $WORKSPACE/omeropy-virtualenv/bin/activate eval $(bash /opt/multi-config.sh ice3.5) $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero web stop sleep 5 $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero web status deactivate rm -rf $WORKSPACE/omeropy-virtualenv fi rm -rf $OMERO_DIST fi

OMERO_DIST=$HOME/OMERO.server OMERO_INSTALL=/tmp/omero-install/linux
ZIP=$(ls OMERO.py*.zip) DIST=${ZIP%.zip} unzip $ZIP rm -f $ZIP mv $WORKSPACE/$DIST $OMERO_DIST
virtualenv $WORKSPACE/omeropy-virtualenv --system-site-packages source $WORKSPACE/omeropy-virtualenv/bin/activate
cd $OMERO_INSTALL source settings.env
# From step04 $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero web config nginx --http "$OMERO_WEB_PORT" > $OMERO_DIST/nginx.conf.tmp
sudo -u root bash step05_centos7_nginx.sh sudo -u root bash step06_centos7_daemon.sh
eval $(bash /opt/multi-config.sh ice3.5) BUILD_ID=DONT_KILL_ME $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero web start
$OMERO_DIST/bin/omero admin diagnostics
